column4: hey, i have serious problems: I just installed some updates with the update manager including nvidia-glx, and after i restarted X, i was stuck in the kernel with the message: Failed to start the X server. I then tried to change the graphics driver in xorg.conf to "nv" from "nvidia", but with no effect. I didn't make a backup of xorg.conf. What can i do to make it start X again?
